front.title: GMPLS Asymmetric Bandwidth Bidirectional Label Switched Paths (LSPs)

abstract.t: This document defines a method for the support of GMPLS asymmetricbandwidth bidirectional Label Switched Paths (LSPs). The presentedapproach is applicable to any switching technology and builds on theoriginal Resource Reservation Protocol (RSVP) model for the transportof traffic-related parameters.
